document_data.mainbody:
luryk Malogh was a notorious violent thief who inhabited the city of Waterdeep sometime before the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Uluryk murdered the heads of two noble houses and taunted their relatives, and also boasted of his association with Waterdeeps banished thieves guild. Wishing to tie off a loose end, agents of the guild were sent to Waterdeep and eventually cornered Uluryk in an alley in the North Ward, where they slew him with poisoned arrows. The alley where he died was later named Catchthief Alley because of this event.
